00017  *              in the top level directory
00018  * description: All MAC designed for use with UWB-IR should derive from this
00019  *        class. It provides the necessary functions to build UWBIR
00020  *        packets and to receive them.

00048 Define_Module(UWBIRMac);
00049 
00050 void UWBIRMac::initialize(int stage) {
00051   BaseMacLayer::initialize(stage);
00052   if (stage == 0) {
00053     debug = par("debug").boolValue();
00054     stats = par("stats").boolValue();
00055     trace = par("trace").boolValue();
00056     prf   = par("PRF");
00057     assert(prf == 4 || prf == 16);
00058     packetsAlwaysValid = par("packetsAlwaysValid");
00059     rsDecoder          = par("RSDecoder").boolValue();
00060     phy = FindModule<MacToPhyInterface*>::findSubModule( this->getNic() );
00061     initCounters();
00062   }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void UWBIRMac::initCounters() {
00066   totalRxBits = 0;
00067   errRxBits = 0;
00068   nbReceivedPacketsRS = 0;
00069   nbReceivedPacketsNoRS = 0;
00070   nbSentPackets = 0;
00071   nbSymbolErrors = 0;
00072   nbSymbolsReceived = 0;
00073   nbHandledRxPackets = 0;
00074   nbFramesDropped = 0;
00075   packetsBER.setName("packetsBER");
00076   meanPacketBER.setName("meanPacketBER");
00077   dataLengths.setName("dataLengths");
00078   sentPulses.setName("sentPulses");
00079   receivedPulses.setName("receivedPulses");
00080   erroneousSymbols.setName("nbErroneousSymbols");
00081   packetSuccessRate.setName("packetSuccessRate");
00082   packetSuccessRateNoRS.setName("packetSuccessRateNoRS");
00083   ber.setName("ber");
00084   RSErrorRate.setName("ser");
00085   success.setName("success");
00086   successNoRS.setName("successNoRS");
00087 }
00088 
00089 void UWBIRMac::finish() {
00090   if (stats) {
00091     recordScalar("Erroneous bits", errRxBits);
00092     recordScalar("nbSymbolErrors", nbSymbolErrors);
00093     recordScalar("Total received bits", totalRxBits);
00094     recordScalar("Average BER", errRxBits / totalRxBits);
00095     recordScalar("nbReceivedPacketsRS", nbReceivedPacketsRS);
00096     recordScalar("nbFramesDropped", nbFramesDropped);
00097     recordScalar("nbReceivedPacketsnoRS", nbReceivedPacketsNoRS);
00098     if (rsDecoder) {
00099       recordScalar("nbReceivedPackets", nbReceivedPacketsRS);
00100     } else {
00101       recordScalar("nbReceivedPackets", nbReceivedPacketsNoRS);
00102     }
00103     recordScalar("nbSentPackets", nbSentPackets);
00104   }
00105 }
00106 
00107 void UWBIRMac::prepareData(UWBIRMacPkt* packet, IEEE802154A::config /*cfg*/) {
00108   // generate signal
00109   //int nbSymbols = packet->getByteLength() * 8 + 92; // to move to ieee802154a.h
00110   debugEV << "prepare Data for a packet with " << packet->getByteLength() << " data bytes." << endl;
00111   if(prf == 4) {
00112     IEEE802154A::setConfig(IEEE802154A::cfg_mandatory_4M);
00113   } else if (prf == 16) {
00114     IEEE802154A::setConfig(IEEE802154A::cfg_mandatory_16M);
00115   }
00116   IEEE802154A::setPSDULength(packet->getByteLength());
00117   IEEE802154A::signalAndData res = IEEE802154A::generateIEEE802154AUWBSignal(simTime());
00118   Signal* theSignal = res.first;
00119   vector<bool>* data = res.second;
00120   int nbSymbols = data->size();
00121   if (trace) {
00122     int nbItems = 0;
00123     ConstMapping* power = theSignal->getTransmissionPower();
00124     ConstMappingIterator* iter = power->createConstIterator();
00125     iter->jumpToBegin();
00126     while (iter->hasNext()) {
00127       nbItems++;
00128       sentPulses.recordWithTimestamp(simTime()
00129           + iter->getPosition().getTime(), iter->getValue());
00130       iter->next();
00131       //simtime_t t = simTime() + iter->getPosition().getTime();
00132       //debugEV << "nbItemsTx=" << nbItems << ", t= " << t <<  ", value=" << iter->getValue() << "." << endl;
00133     }
00134   }
00135 
00136   // save bit values
00137   //packet->setBitValuesArraySize(data->size());
00138   for (int pos = 0; pos < nbSymbols; pos = pos + 1) {
00139     packet->pushBitvalue(data->at(pos));
00140     //packet->setBitValues(pos, data->at(pos));
00141   }
00142   delete data;
00143 
00144   packet->setNbSymbols(nbSymbols);
00145 
00146   // attach control info
00147   MacToUWBIRPhyControlInfo::setControlInfo(packet, theSignal, IEEE802154A::getConfig());
00148 }
00149 
00150 bool UWBIRMac::validatePacket(UWBIRMacPkt *mac) {
00151   nbHandledRxPackets++;
00152   if (!packetsAlwaysValid) {
00153     PhyToMacControlInfo * phyToMac = dynamic_cast<PhyToMacControlInfo*> (mac->getControlInfo());
00154     DeciderResultUWBIR * res = dynamic_cast<DeciderResultUWBIR*>(phyToMac->getDeciderResult());
00155     const std::vector<bool> * decodedBits = res->getDecodedBits();
00156     int bitsToDecode = mac->getNbSymbols();
00157     nbSymbolsReceived = nbSymbolsReceived + ceil((double)bitsToDecode / IEEE802154A::RSSymbolLength);
00158     int nbBitErrors = 0;
00159     int pktSymbolErrors = 0;
00160     bool currSymbolError = false;
00161 
00162     for (int i = 0; i < bitsToDecode; i++) {
00163       // Start of a new symbol
00164       if (i % IEEE802154A::RSSymbolLength == 0) {
00165         currSymbolError = false;
00166       }
00167       // bit error
00168       if (decodedBits->at(i) != mac->popBitValue()) {
00169         nbBitErrors++;
00170         debugEV<< "Found an error at position " << i << "." << std::endl;
00171         // symbol error
00172         if(!currSymbolError) {
00173           currSymbolError = true;
00174           pktSymbolErrors = pktSymbolErrors + 1;
00175         }
00176       }
00177     }
00178 
00179     debugEV << "Found " << nbBitErrors << " bit errors in MAC packet." << std::endl;
00180     double packetBER = static_cast<double>(nbBitErrors)/static_cast<double>(bitsToDecode);
00181     packetsBER.record(packetBER);
00182     meanBER.collect(packetBER);
00183     meanPacketBER.record(meanBER.getMean());
00184     if(trace) {
00185       erroneousSymbols.record(pktSymbolErrors);
00186     }
00187 
00188     // ! If this condition is true then the next one will also be true
00189     if(nbBitErrors == 0) {
00190       successNoRS.record(1);
00191       nbReceivedPacketsNoRS++;
00192       packet.setNbPacketsReceivedNoRS(packet.getNbPacketsReceivedNoRS()+1);
00193     } else {
00194       successNoRS.record(0);
00195     }
00196 
00197     if (pktSymbolErrors <= IEEE802154A::RSMaxSymbolErrors) {
00198       success.record(1);
00199       nbReceivedPacketsRS++;
00200       packet.setNbPacketsReceived(packet.getNbPacketsReceived()+1);
00201       emit(BaseLayer::catPacketSignal, &packet);
00202     } else {
00203       success.record(0);
00204       nbFramesDropped++;
00205     }
00206 
00207     if(stats) {
00208       totalRxBits += bitsToDecode;
00209       errRxBits += nbBitErrors;
00210       nbSymbolErrors += pktSymbolErrors;
00211       ber.record(errRxBits/totalRxBits);
00212       packetSuccessRate.record( ((double) nbReceivedPacketsRS)/nbHandledRxPackets);
00213       packetSuccessRateNoRS.record( ((double) nbReceivedPacketsNoRS)/nbHandledRxPackets);
00214       RSErrorRate.record( ((double) nbSymbolErrors) / nbSymbolsReceived);
00215     }
00216 
00217     // validate message
00218     bool success = false;
00219 
00220     success = (nbBitErrors == 0 || (rsDecoder && pktSymbolErrors <= IEEE802154A::RSMaxSymbolErrors) );
00221 
00222     return success;
00223   }
00224   return true;
00225 }
00226 
00227 void UWBIRMac::handleLowerMsg(cPacket *msg) {
00228   UWBIRMacPkt *mac = static_cast<UWBIRMacPkt *> (msg);
00229 
00230   if (validatePacket(mac)) {
00231     const LAddress::L2Type& dest = mac->getDestAddr();
00232     const LAddress::L2Type& src  = mac->getSrcAddr();
00233     if ((dest == myMacAddr)) {
00234       debugEV<< "message with mac addr " << src
00235       << " for me (dest=" << dest
00236       << ") -> forward packet to upper layer" << std::endl;
00237       sendUp(decapsMsg(mac));
00238     } else {
00239       debugEV << "message with mac addr " << src
00240       << " not for me (dest=" << dest
00241       << ") -> delete (my MAC=" << myMacAddr << ")" << std::endl;
00242       delete mac;
00243     }
00244   } else {
00245     debugEV << "Errors in message ; dropping mac packet." << std::endl;
00246     delete mac;
00247   }
00248 }
